name: Eelektross Pokemon Showdown Style
description: An eelektross based CSS made for Pokemon Showdown servers. If you see any error or something that looks weird, please PM me in a server such as Origin, I'm usually under the name Master Float. This CSS is by far the biggest and the most time consuming CSS I've done so far. This CSS is dedicated to @Nick.
additional_info:
The battle CSS was created by Xaiya Ao, so all the credit of that goes to him. To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    23ᵗʰ March 2015:
      - removing the mainmenufooter's little separators's shadow
      - setting the mainmenufooter's little separators's color


    25ᵗʰ March 2015:

    30ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - Fixed the "users online" and "active battles"'s numbers's text.
      - Made the roomlist a.ilink buttons have a border radius of 0px.

    28ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons.
